node_info.name: manualTrigger
node_info.description: Runs the flow on clicking a button in n8n

properties.displayName:
This node is where the workflow execution starts (when you click the ‘test’ button on the canvas).

Explore other ways to trigger your workflow (e.g on a schedule, or a webhook)

notes.name: Notes

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?

settings.note: Trigger nodes only have common settings (notes, notesInFlow)
